l2complements.configuration.title: 莱特兰扩充 - 配置
l2complements.configuration.section.l2configs.l2complements.client.t: 莱特兰扩充 - 客户端配置
莱特兰扩充 - 客户端配置
l2complements.configuration.section.l2configs.l2complements.server.t: 莱特兰扩充 - 服务端配置
莱特兰扩充 - 服务端配置
l2complements.configuration.enableSpawnEggRecipe.tooltip: Allow spawn eggs to be crafted with L2Complements materials
l2complements.configuration.enableToolRecraftRecipe.tooltip: Allow tools to be upgraded from tools with same type but different materials
l2complements.configuration.enableVanillaItemRecipe.tooltip: Allow vanilla items such as elytra and ancient debris to be crafted with L2Complements materials
l2complements.configuration.useArsNouveauForEnchantmentRecipe.toolti: When Ars Nouveau is present, use apparatus recipe for enchantments
l2complements.configuration.blackFireChargeDuration: Black Fire Charge effect duration in ticks
l2complements.configuration.soulFireChargeDuration: Soul Fire Charge effect duration in ticks
l2complements.configuration.strongFireChargePower.tooltip:
Power: 2 for Ghast, 3 for Creeper, 4 for TNT, 5 for beds, 6 for End Crystal
Range: 1 ~ 10
l2complements.configuration.belowVoid.tooltip:
Blocks below min build height for void eye drop
Range: 0 ~ 128
l2complements.configuration.mobTypeBonus: Bonus damage factor for effective targets
l2complements.configuration.mobTypeBonus.tooltip:
This is for weapons made with totemic gold and poseidite.
When weapons with above materials is used against mob types they are effective for
This number determines the bonus in percentage of original damage
Range: 0.0 ~ 1000.0
l2complements.configuration.phantomHeight.tooltip:
Blocks above max build height for sun membrane drop
Range: 0 ~ 10000
l2complements.configuration.spaceShardDrop.tooltip:
- Allow: Space Shard is enabled
- Default: When certain mods are installed, Space Shard will be banned
- Deny: Space Shard is banned
Allowed Values: ALLOW, DEFAULT, DENY
l2complements.configuration.cleansePredicate.tooltip:
- ALL: for clearing everything
- EXCEPT_BENEFICIAL: for clearing neutral and negative only
- HARMFUL_ONLY: for clearing negative only
Allowed Values: ALL, EXCEPT_BENEFICIAL, HARMFUL_ONLY
l2complements.configuration.eternalTotemCoolDown: Cool down of Eternal Totem of Dream
l2complements.configuration.eternalTotemGiveWarpStone: Eternal Totem of Dream giving you warp stone
l2complements.configuration.totemicHealDuration: Totemic Armor healing interval in ticks
l2complements.configuration.enableImmunityEnchantments.tooltip: Be sure to inform players when you turn this off
l2complements.configuration.bleedEnchantDuration: Sharp Blade: Base effect duration in ticks
l2complements.configuration.bleedEnchantMax: Sharp Blade: Max effect level per enchantment level
l2complements.configuration.curseEnchantDuration: Cursed Blade: Base effect duration in ticks
l2complements.configuration.flameEnchantDuration: Hell Fire Blade: effect duration in ticks
l2complements.configuration.iceEnchantDuration: Freezing Blade: Base effect duration in ticks
l2complements.configuration.lifeSyncFactor: Life Sync: Damage to user per durability cost
l2complements.configuration.voidTouchChance: Void Touch: Chance for true damage
l2complements.configuration.voidTouchChanceBonus: Void Touch: extra chance when damage already bypass armor or magic
l2complements.configuration.windSpeed.tooltip:
Requirement for obtaining Captured Wind. Unit: Block per Tick
Range: 0.1 ~ 100.0
l2complements.configuration.windSweepIncrement: Wind Sweep: Hit box increment per level
l2complements.configuration.chainDiggingBlockPerTick.tooltip:
Max number of blocks to break per tick in delayed breaking
Range: 1 ~ 1024
l2complements.configuration.chainDiggingDelayThreshold.tooltip:
Max number of blocks to break before resort to delayed breaking
Range: 1 ~ 1024
l2complements.configuration.chainDiggingHardnessRange.tooltip:
Max hardness blocks to break may have, as a factor of the hardness of the block broken.
Apotheosis implementation of chain digging use 3 has their hardness factor.
Range: 1.0 ~ 100.0
l2complements.configuration.delayDiggingRequireEnder.tooltip: Delayed breaking requires Ender Transport to take effect to reduce lag
l2complements.configuration.treeChopMaxBlock.tooltip:
Max number of blocks to be considered for tree chopping.
Range: 0 ~ 16384
l2complements.configuration.treeChopMaxHeight.tooltip:
Max height for blocks to be considered for tree chopping.
Range: 0 ~ 512
l2complements.configuration.treeChopMaxRadius.tooltip:
Max radius for blocks to be considered for tree chopping, except upward direction
Range: 0 ~ 32
